summary: Project to recreate a print layout to match an uploaded reference photo.

existing_features.title: Implement a dedicated print-only resident report layout that matches the uploaded reference image (print.JPG), including a multi-page document structure with consistent header, section titles, typography, spacing, and table styling.
Update the resident profile print flow so the existing Print action prints the new print-only report layout while keeping the current on-screen resident profile experience unchanged.

Extend print CSS to support document-style printing for the new report layout (A4 sizing/margins, print-safe colors, table borders, and page-break handling), without breaking existing print behavior elsewhere.

new_feature_requests.summary: Recreate the print layout to match the uploaded reference photo.

projectName: Recreate resident profile print layout to match uploaded reference (print.JPG)
